headline: Crown Castle (CCI): Forecast Profit Growth Challenges Bearish Narratives Despite Revenue Declines
summary: Crown Castle (CCI) reported continued losses, with net income declining at an annualized rate of 47% over the last five years. The company’s earnings are forecast to rise dramatically, with an average increase of 89.88% per year and an expectation to turn profitable within three years. However, revenue is projected to shrink by 9.1% per year in that same period. Shares are currently trading at $98.27, which is well below the estimated fair value of $127.83. Investors are weighing the...
